alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 06 at 6:59PM EDT until April 06 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles south of Quitman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Quitman around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Blue Springs, Nankin and Empress. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
